CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 23, 1964, page 9, reads: "Fete Bishop - Bishop G.E.Vaughn and guests who attended the testimonial dinner in honor of the Bishop, at Bethel AME Church, by the Churches of God in Christ of Western Pennsylvania. Left to right: The Rev. H.B. Evans, master of ceremonies; J.H. Stevenson, chairman; Mr. and Mrs. Thomas L. West Sr., Bishop and Mrs. G.E. Vaughan, Supervisor Ida B. Martin and Mrs. Diane Wilson."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, from left: Reverend H.B. Evans, J.H. Stevenson, Mr. and Mrs. Thomas L. West Sr., Bishop and Mrs. G.E. Vaughan, Ida B. Martin, and Diane Wilson, seated at banquet table in Bethel AME Church for testimonial dinner, another angle
